comment.author: 46212770@N08
comment._content:
From 'The Lockheed Twins' by Peter J Marson:
(c/n 1467) Model 14WF62 G-AFGN British Airways regd June '38, delivered 16 Aug '38, E-4124 23 Aug '38, Certificate of Airworthiness 
15 Sept '38.
Flew first non-stop service Stockholm - Heston, UK 18th September 1938
Carburettor caught fire in mid-air and crashed in attempted forced-landing at Luxeuil, France 11th August 1939. No casualties.
